name: HurcoDigitalAssistant
0:
”Alexa, tell Hurco calibrate Machine 1.”
”Alexa, tell Hurco warmup Machine 1.”
”Alexa, tell Hurco probe tool 3 on Machine 1”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hurco
Developer Terms of Use
des: With the Hurco Alexa Controller you can remotely control your Hurco CNC machine tool! Remotely toggle power, calibrate, warmup, probe tool, run a program, and more. This skill requires a login to ESF. (Extended Shop Floor) If you do not have an ESF account please contact Hurco Support.
